title.title: title
title.description: Name by which the cited resource is known

abstract.title: abstract
abstract.description: Brief narrative summary of the content of the resource(s)

category.title: category
category.description: high-level geographic data thematic classification to assist in the grouping and search of available geographic data sets

attribution.title: Attribution
attribution.description: Authority or function assigned, as to a ruler, legislative assembly, delegate, or the like.

data_quality_statement.title: data quality statement
data_quality_statement.description: general explanation of the data producer's knowledge about the lineage of a dataset

restriction_code_type.title: restriction_code_type
restriction_code_type.description: limitation(s) placed upon the access or use of the data.

constraints_other.title: Other constrains
constraints_other.description: other restrictions and legal prerequisites for accessing and using the resource or metadata

doi.title: DOI
doi.description: a DOI will be added by Admin before publication.

purpose.title: purpose
purpose.description: Summary of the intentions with which the resource(s) was developed

supplemental_information.title: supplemental information
supplemental_information.description: any other descriptive information about the dataset

temporal_extent_start.title: temporal_extent_start
temporal_extent_start.description: time period covered by the content of the dataset (start)

temporal_extent_end.title: temporal_extent_end
temporal_extent_end.description: time period covered by the content of the dataset (end)

maintenance_frequency.title: maintenance frequency
maintenance_frequency.description: frequency with which modifications and deletions are made to the data after it is first produced

spatial_representation_type.title: spatial_representation_type
spatial_representation_type.description: method used to represent geographic information in the dataset.
